verbose_text: However, VEGFR2 is associated with adhesion molecule expression, as stimulation of VEGFR2 can induce the phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K)-Akt and NF-kappaB pathway, which in turn leads to the de novo synthesis of molecules, including VCAM-1 and E-selectin.
evidence: VEGFR2 can induce the phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K)-Akt and NF-kappaB
